about_the_game:
In Deadly Rehearsal, you play as Dodger, a disgraced stage manager hired by a prestigious director to perform a cursed play. The rehearsal is plagued with gruesome accidents and nightmarish visions. To save the cast and yourself, you must master the art of stagecraft and confront evils behind the curse.

The only way to break the curse is to finish it with everyone intact.

Features

  • Perform the duties of a stage manager by executing the cues of the play perfectly. Every mistake strengthens the curse.

  • Explore the abandoned Grand Orpheus Theatre, and find clues to what truly happened here.

  • Discover the story of each cast and crew and how they can help break this curse.

  • Solve unique puzzles that unlock the mysteries of the play.

  • An immersive first person narrative with fully animated cutscenes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or new-gen i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660S
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: The rehearsal must be flawless. Every sound, every light timed perfectly. You are one of the best stage manager's after all. Failure is not an option. The play is cursed... and it demands perfection.
